response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been designed with top-quality materials and features to meet your needs. Given its value and benefits, we believe it's worth more than $80 to you. Considering its worth to both us and you, I propose to sell it to you for $95. This price reflects the product's high quality and the opportunity to own something truly exceptional. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 95}
